    • nextRound

      public void nextRound() throws Exception
      nextRound()

      increases the score for every new round.
      checks the locations for every gameElement and will do something(explained in the methods) if positions are equal.
      checks if the game has been won or lost.

      Throws:
      Exception - (if an error happened)

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      startGame() displays the board with its GameElements.
      Also takes input for moving the characters etc.
